guardian.title: Russia shelled Ukrainians from within its own territory, says study
guardian.topComment: Nothing in that first explanatory vid proves a thing. Why for instance would Russia expend lots of expensive arms to attack a grassy field? A bunch of lines on a graphic is the sort of bullshit that plays very well in the US, where people don't think...

guardian.title: Pressure mounts on Athens to accept extension
guardian.topComment: It's a shame. I quite like the Greek Finance Minister and Prime Minister. They have worked tirelessly to achieve compromise with their EU counterparts. They haven't thrown their weight around they've merely pointed out their democratic mandate which ...
